list-widget.empty: There are no items in this list.

user-profile.text: Your user profile has the following information:

grant-table.active-tokens: Number of currently active access tokens
grant-table.no-sites: You have not approved any sites.
grant-table.no-whitelisted: You have not accessed any whitelisted sites.
grant-table.pre-approved: These are sites that have been pre-approved by an administrator.
grant-table.text: These are sites you have approved manually. If the same site asks for the same access in the future, it will be granted without prompting.
grant-table.whitelist-note: NOTE: If you revoke them here, they will automatically be re-approved on your next visit wthout prompting.
grant-table.whitelisted-site: This site was whitelisted by an adminstrator

token-table.associated-id: This access token was issued with an associated ID token.
token-table.associated-refresh: This access token was issued with an associated refresh token.
token-table.click-to-display: Click to display full token value
token-table.confirm: Are you sure sure you would like to revoke this token?
token-table.confirm-refresh: Are you sure sure you would like to revoke this refresh token and its associated access tokens?
token-table.no-access: There are no active access tokens.
token-table.no-refresh: There are no active refresh tokens.
token-table.text: Access tokens are usually short-lived and provide clients with access to specific resources. ID Tokens are specialized access tokens to facilitate log on using OpenID Connect.
token-table.text-refresh: Refresh tokens are usually long-lived and provide clients with the ability to get new access tokens without end-user involvement.

whitelist.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this whitelist entry?

whitelist-table.no-sites: There are no whitelisted sites. Use the whitelist button on the client management page to create one.
